properties.address: Colwell Baptist Church, Isle of Wight PO40 9NB
properties.description: On a Tuesday afternoon, we open our church hall as a warm space for all...we also offer free tea/coffee.
properties.title: Colwell Community Cafe

properties.description: Community Meal - every Wednesday at 5.30pm families and individuals of all ages and stages warmly welcomed Enjoy community and friendship over a hot homecooked meal and dessert. Please book space with Sarah on 07536 983678 so we know numbers (we are happy to cater for your dietary needs)
properties.title: Community Meal at The Runway

properties.description: The Bridge is open from 10am-4pm Monday to Friday A computer is available to access the internet Books/activities/tv/music
properties.title: The Bridge

properties.description: Puzzles and board games, Signposting - advice, Free Refreshments e.g tea and coffee , Someone to talk to, Free Snacks e.g cakes and biscuits , Disabled Access, Signposting - Information Leaflets,
properties.title: Pop In Cafe
